attributes.action: Get justice for Samia Shahid who was murdered in Pakistan by her family members.
attributes.background: Pakistani authorities who are heading up the murder investigation are calling for Samia's mother & sister (also British Citizens) who fled Pakistan during the murder to be called back for questioning. Sign this petition to make sure this happens as soon as possible.

rejection.details:
The justice system in Pakistan is not the responsibility of the UK Government and Parliament.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to raise this case with the government of Pakistan.
